stories.text:
I have an upcoming third and last interview with a well-established German company for the Frontend position.

I will be joined by the Tech Lead and the Tech manager of the company discussing my future role, current projects in their pipeline, as well as how I will get along with them.

I haven't gone through any technical assessment from their end yet. And the HR told me there won't be any technical assessment rather they would assess me based on questions and answers.

This is a kind of new experience for me because in the past I always had some sort of frontend challenge to solve before they proceeded with my application.

I guess the Tech lead would ask technical questions and I want to be as well prepared for that as possible.

Is this common for a German company to have such a short recruiting process? Anyone else went through a similar experience? Any suggestions on what should I look forward to in the upcoming interview.

Thanks
stories.title: Ask HN: Upcoming Interview with Tech Lead
